name: pnp-export-flow-logicapp
title: Export a single flow to a Logic App
shortDescription: This script will export the Power Automate flow.
longDescription: This script will export the Power Automate flow *Your sample test flow*, make sure to pass the correct name in the script, and your flow will be exported right away.

references.name: Want to learn more about CLI for Microsoft 365 and the commands
references.description: Check out the CLI for Microsoft 365 site to get started and for the reference to the commands.
